name: Duckroid
description:
Jump in and shoot your way through this duck-based micro-metroidvania adventure.

The year is 30XX. The G-Virus outbreak has been going on for two years now. The miraculous mineral, McGuffinite, holds the secret to curing the virus. When supply runs out, it's up to Captain Duckroid to search a distant planet to find a new source of the mysterious ore.

Will Duckroid return home a hero, or will he perish in vain on an alien planet?
